name: Tunnel Knight
description:
All the miners working on the construction of a tunnel were suddenly transformed into undead. A Knight was sent to make his way through the undead and find what happaned at the end of the tunnel.

Tunnel Knight is an action game that happens in a circular map. Your objective is to kill as many enemies and bosses as possible to reach deeper into the tunnel.

The game is still in development but it is ready to be played.
